predicate.note: Frames file for 'mutter' based on sentences in brown. Verbnet entry

example.name: no listener
example.text: Ramsey has a thing or two *trace-1* to mutter about *trace-2* himself.

example.name: all args
example.text: She muttered in a low but intense voice, to herself, ``I hate that woman inside me''!
example.arg: in a low but intense voice

example.name: only subject
example.text: He put the basket down distastefully, *trace* muttering softly and thoroughly disgusted with himself and his plan that had seemed so foolproof.
